name: Trials of the Twisted Timber Land
name_original: Trials of the Twisted Timber Land
description:
“Can you find your way through this twisted forest? I often find myself returning to where I started… It’s like I’m walking in circles. And what’s with that music that seems to be getting louder? Is that a giant floating stone head?”

This top-down action RPG-like game features puzzles, enemies and of course slimes! Aimed to be 15-20 minutes in duration but maybe you can beat it faster if you’re really smart.

EDIT: After some feedback regarding combat, we have found that there is a small oversight where knockback only applies to enemies when attacking and walking at the same time (not when stationary).
